pages.text: The enderlink is a tool I've developed for teleportation. Some alien creatures could do so, and they infrequently dropped items that allowed me to teleport as well. However, I had never had a way to force the teleportation of an entity. The enderlink fulfills that purpose.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: To use the enderlink, place it in the direction you want the creature to teleport out from, then place ender dust on the ground. When you, a creature, or even an item touches the ender dust, the enderlink should teleport you to itself.

The enderlink is not the fastest means of transport, by far. It's rather inconsistent in operation and inconvenient to set up. However, it's perfect for quickly moving many things in a wide area to a tiny space. Are you picking up what I'm putting down? (Maybe not, but the enderlink definitely is.)$(p)Also, note, you can recolor the enderlink and the ender dust; the enderlink will only teleport things on dust of the same alignment.

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: Each range upgrade will increase the teleportation range by around one block.
